# Review and Feedback

## Review Process

### Types of Reviews

1. Content Review
   - Accuracy check
   - Completeness
   - Consistency

2. Technical Review
   - Factual accuracy
   - Technical correctness
   - Implementation feasibility

3. Editorial Review
   - Grammar and style
   - Flow and readability
   - Format consistency

## Feedback Management

### Collecting Feedback

::: {.callout-important}
## Feedback Guidelines
- Be specific
- Provide examples
- Suggest improvements
- Stay constructive
:::

### Feedback Categories

| Type | Focus | Reviewers |
|------|-------|-----------|
| Technical | Accuracy | Subject experts |
| Editorial | Style | Editors |
| User | Usability | Target audience |
